title: Tahliyah?
body:
so the new champ that i cant spell right, toph, feel really off... so i played a game with her today as support, thinking "hey control mage bot, should be good right?" boy was i wrong. I couldn't deal with what abilities were what and having to recast the damn w to actually launch someone somewhere. 

I feel that her kit is muddled and clunky, mainly due to her w and e being in the wrong spots and having to recast the w to actually launch someone. if you have it on quick cast shouldn't it really be quick cast? similar to viktor's death ray? and her e, why does it have a cast time and why can't you cast it while casting the w, that would make for a hard and easily readable skillshot to actually be punishable if you hit it?   anyway, what are your guys thought on her?

replies.body:
Taliyah

she getting reasonable buffs, but its all on her q.

cd smaller, cost lower and 50% increased damage to minions

1) You have to get quite close to do her thing like Cassiopia (at least cass has an ult to throw out to stop retaliation). People will just mass nuke you out of principle  to make sure you don't try anything in the future.

2) The wall is great. So good its a slight obstacle for her to receive major buffs, perhaps.

3) Too reliant on Rylias. Wow. You feel like there are two phases of the game - before and after you get this item. The playstyle completely shifts.
There's also a bug where after you e w you can't q for a few seconds, another rushed fail release tbh
